text: The Journal of Cultural Economy is a bimonthly peer-reviewed academic journal covering cultural and economic sociology. It was established in 2008 and is published by Routledge. The editors-in-chief are Liz McFall (Open University) and Taylor Nelms (University of California, Irvine). According to the Journal Citation Reports, the journal has a 2017 impact factor of 0.944. ==References== ==External links== * *Editors' website Category:Publications established in 2008 Category:Sociology journals Category:Routledge academic journals Category:English-language journals Category:Bimonthly journals Category:Economic sociology
title: Journal of Cultural Economy
